item.title: 萨博预计 2025 年有机销售增长率在 12%-16%之间
item.description: 瑞典防务设备制造商萨博周五表示，预计 2025 年的有机销售额将增长 12% 至 16%，同时还更新了 2023-2027 年的中期目标。【原文：Saab expects organic sales growth of between 12% and 16% in 2025, the Swedish defence equipment maker said on Friday, as it also updated its medium-term targets for 2023-2027.】

item.title: 路透社调查：中国 1 月份银行贷款激增，但需求依然脆弱
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，由于信贷需求低迷继续拖累贷款，中国1月份新增人民币贷款可能比12月份激增，但仍低于一年前创下的纪录水平。【原文：China's new yuan loans likely surged in January compared to December but still remained below the record level hit a year earlier, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, as subdued credit demand continued to weigh on lending.】

item.title: 大而无牙--意大利工会因工资停滞不前而备受指责
item.description: 在经历了三十年的工资停滞后，意大利工人有很多需要抗议的地方，但因工资问题而举行的罢工却很少，而且很少持续超过一天，这引发了人们对该国工会作用的越来越多的质疑。【原文：After three decades of wage stagnation, workers in Italy have plenty to protest about, yet strikes over pay are rare and seldom last more than a day, prompting growing questions about the role of the country's trade unions.】

item.title: 俄罗斯加大国内资产扣押力度，谷物贸易商和莫斯科机场被抢
item.description: 在上周法院裁定将一家主要谷物贸易商、莫斯科庞大的多莫杰多沃机场和战略仓库资产移交给国家之后，俄罗斯今年正在加快国内资产扣押的步伐。【原文：Russia is quickening the pace of domestic asset seizures this year after courts ruled last week that a leading grain trader, Moscow's sprawling Domodedovo airport and strategic warehouse assets be handed over to the state.】

item.title: 英国低收入购物者苦苦挣扎，挑战经济增长议程
item.description: 黛比-泰勒（Deb Taylor）从她在英国南部南安普顿的经济型时装零售商 Primark 分店出来时两手空空，抱怨说 "连便宜货都不便宜了"。【原文：Deb Taylor emerged empty-handed from her branch of budget fashion retailer Primark in Southampton, southern England, complaining that "even the cheap stuff's not cheap anymore".】

item.title: 早间竞标：中国人工智能反弹唤醒贸易战恐惧市场
item.description: 安库尔-班吉对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banejee】

item.title: 喧闹的 1 月份就业报告预计美国就业将温和增长
item.description: 美国 1 月份的就业增长可能放缓，部分原因是受到加州野火和全国大部分地区寒冷天气的抑制，但还不足以让美联储在上半年结束前恢复降息。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed in January, partly restrained by wild fires in California and cold weather across much of the country, though not enough for the Federal Reserve to resume interest rate cuts before the end of the first half.】

item.title: 沃尔格林出售更多 Cencora 股份，持股比例降至 6
item.description: 美国连锁药店沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）周四表示，该公司已经出售了更多药品分销商 Cencora 的股份，收益约为 3 亿美元。【原文：U.S. drugstore chain Walgreens Boots Alliance said on Thursday it has sold more shares in drug distributor Cencora for proceeds of about $300 million.】

item.title: 受关税担忧影响，石油将连续第三周下跌
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价小幅上涨，但受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重启对华贸易战以及威胁对其他国家加征关税的影响，油价有望连续第三周下跌。【原文：Oil prices rose marginally in early Asian trade on Friday but were on track for a third straight week of decline, hurt by U.S. President Donald Trump's renewed trade war on China and threats of tariff hikes on other countries.】

item.title: 中国小米公司首席执行官表示将探索提高汽车产量的途径
item.description: 中国小米公司首席执行官兼创始人雷军周五在其社交媒体账户上表示，将探索提高汽车产能的途径。【原文：China's Xiaomi will explore ways to ramp up auto production capacity, CEO and founder Lei Jun said on his social media account on Friday.】

item.title: 特斯拉将 Model X 汽车在美国的售价提高 5,000 美元
item.description: 据特斯拉网站报道，特斯拉周四将其 Model X 汽车在美国的售价提高了 5000 美元。【原文：Tesla raised the prices of its Model X cars in the United States by $5,000 on Thursday, according to its website.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，准确分析特朗普关税影响为时尚早
item.description: 国际货币基金组织第一副总裁吉塔-戈皮纳特（Gita Gopinath）周五表示，现在对美国对其他国家提高关税的后果进行精确分析还为时过早。【原文：It is too early for any precise analysis of the consequences of higher U.S. tariffs against other countries, Gita Gopinath, the first deputy managing director of the International Monetary Fund, said on Friday.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras 与法国 Mistral 合作，声称创下速度纪录
item.description: 由阿联酋科技企业集团 G42 支持的人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras Systems 周四表示，它已与法国 Mistral 公司合作，并帮助这家欧洲人工智能公司创下了速度纪录。【原文：Cerebras Systems, an artificial intelligence chip firm backed by UAE tech conglomerate G42, said on Thursday it has partnered with France's Mistral and has helped the European AI player achieve a speed record.】

item.title: 加息押注令日元走高，美国就业数据受关注
item.description: 日元攀升至九周来的高点，原因是市场人士纷纷押注日本今年会有更多的加息举措，而美元和其他主要货币则在当天晚些时候公布的美国月度就业数据公布前走低。【原文：The yen climbed to a nine-week high as market players piled on bets for more interest rate hikes in Japan this year, while the U.S. dollar and other major currencies trod water ahead of U.S. monthly payrolls figures due later in the day.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告日本注意外国市场波动加剧的溢出效应
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周五表示，日本应警惕外国市场波动加剧所带来的溢出效应，因为这可能会影响日本金融机构的流动性状况。【原文：Japan should be on alert for any spillover effects from rising foreign market volatility that could affect liquidity conditions for its financial institutions, the International Monetary Fund said on Friday.】

item.title: IMF 预计日本央行今年将再次加息，到 2027 年底达到中性水平
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的一位高级官员周四表示，日本央行很可能在今年再次加息，并在2027年底之前使借贷成本达到被认为对经济中性的水平。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to raise interest rates again this year and see borrowing costs reach levels deemed neutral to the economy by the end of 2027, a senior International Monetary Fund official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 国际清算银行就特朗普不确定性给经济和央行政策带来的风险发出警告
item.description: 世界领先的央行伞式组织国际清算银行首次就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战和放松管制计划带来的风险发出公开警告。【原文：The world's leading central bank umbrella group, the Bank for International Settlements, has delivered its first public warning about the risks posed by U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war and deregulation plans.】

item.title: 多米诺澳大利亚专营店因关闭门店而大涨，2025 财年下半年开局良好
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚多米诺比萨企业股价创下有史以来最大盘中涨幅，此前这家比萨连锁店运营商宣布关闭 205 家亏损门店，并表示 2025 财年下半年将有一个良好的开端。【原文：Shares of Australia's Domino's Pizza Enterprises were heading for their biggest intraday jump ever on Friday, after the pizza chain operator flagged the closure of 205 loss-making stores and signalled a positive start to the second half of fiscal 2025.】

item.title: 日本 12 月家庭支出超出预期
item.description: 12 月份，日本家庭支出出现了五个月来的首次同比增长，且增长速度远高于预期。【原文：Japanese household spending rose for the first time in five months in year-on-year terms in December and at a much faster-than-expected pace.】

item.title: 特朗普对中国征收关税让美国讨价还价的网购者吃不消
item.description: 本周三，马修-坎农（Matthew Cannon）上大学的女儿向他转发了一份来自快递公司 DHL 的请求，要求他为她在澳大利亚时装卖家 I.Am.Gia 的订单支付 45.19 美元的关税和费用。她想知道这是否是个骗局。【原文：On Wednesday, Matthew Cannon's college-age daughter forwarded him a request from delivery company DHL asking for duties and fees of $45.19 tied to her order from Australian fashion seller I.Am.Gia. She wanted to know if it was a scam.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司就美国对 F-35 合同定价缺陷的指控达成和解
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，美国国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corporation）已同意支付2974万美元，以了结对F-35军用飞机合同定价缺陷的指控。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Lockheed Martin Corporation has agreed to pay $29.74 million to settle allegations of defective pricing on contracts for F-35 military aircraft, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.】

item.title: 化妆品需求疲软影响年度预测，精灵美容股价大跌
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）的股价在周四的延时交易中暴跌 20%以上，此前该化妆品公司下调了年度净销售额和利润预期，理由是年初大众美容产品需求疲软。【原文：Elf Beauty's shares tumbled over 20% in extended trading on Thursday, after the cosmetics company cut its annual net sales and profit forecasts, citing weak demand in the mass beauty category at the start of the year.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长称特朗普的关税威胁已产生影响
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）周四表示，美国的政策转变正在引发不确定性，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁已经对企业和家庭造成了影响。【原文：Bank of Canada's Governor Tiff Macklem said on Thursday that a policy shift in the U.S. was causing uncertainty and President Donald Trump's tariff threats were already impacting business and households.】

item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿寻求美国证券交易委员会批准推出新的加密货币指数 ETF
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿投资公司（Franklin Templeton Investments）周四表示，该公司正在寻求监管部门批准推出一款新的加密货币指数交易所交易基金，因为资产管理公司希望在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选之际，在加密货币浪潮中套现。【原文：Franklin Templeton Investments is seeking regulatory approval to launch a new crypto index exchange-traded fund, the firm said on Thursday, as asset managers hope to cash in on the crypto wave amid Donald Trump's victory in U.S. presidential elections.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储罗根发出降息信号，要求美国劳动力市场降温
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周四表示，只要劳动力市场不出现动摇，即使通胀率下降到接近美联储2%的目标，她也准备在 "相当长的一段时间内 "维持利率不变。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan on Thursday signaled she was ready to keep interest rates on hold for "quite some time" even if inflation drops closer to the Fed's 2% goal, as long as the labor market does not falter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普的巴黎人工智能峰会代表团将不包括人工智能安全研究所的工作人员
item.description: 下周在巴黎举行的一次重要人工智能峰会上，美国代表团将不包括该国人工智能安全研究所的技术人员，两位接近华盛顿此次活动计划的人士和第三位知情人士告诉路透社记者。【原文：The U.S. delegation to a major artificial intelligence summit in Paris next week will not include technical staff from the country's AI Safety Institute, two people close to Washington's plans for the event and a third source briefed on the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本央行重新审视劳动力紧缩为更多加息敞开大门
item.description: 日本央行将经济活动疲软归咎于长期劳动力短缺，而非需求停滞。【原文：The Bank of Japan is blaming chronic labour shortages, not stagnant demand, for weak economic activity.】

item.title: 官员称扎克伯格周四在白宫参加会议
item.description: 据一位白宫官员称，Meta 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格周四在白宫参加会议。【原文：Meta Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg was at the White House on Thursday for meetings, according to a White House official.】

item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Illumina 预测 2025 年收入大幅低于预期
item.description: 基因测序机制造商Illumina周四预测2025年收入将大幅低于华尔街预期，这表明市场对其基因测试和诊断工具的需求疲软，股价在盘后交易中下跌近4%。【原文：Gene sequencing machine maker Illumina forecast 2025 revenue largely below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling subdued demand for its genetic tests and diagnostic tools, sending shares down nearly 4% in extended trading.】
